parameters.description: The query contains one or more search keywords and qualifiers. Qualifiers allow you to limit your search to specific areas of GitHub. For example: “addClass+in:file+language:js+repo:jquery/jquery” means that you are searching for the keyword addClass within a files contents. We are making sure that we are only looking in files where the language is JavaScript. And we are scoping the search to the repo:jquery/jquery repository.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Sorts the results of your query. Can only be indexed, which indicates how recently a file has been indexed by the GitHub search infrastructure. Default: best match
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Determines whether the first search result returned is the highest number of matches (desc) or lowest number of matches (asc). This parameter is ignored unless you provide sort.
parameters.name: order
